Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli will make a comeback in the T20 series against Afghanistan after a hiatus of nearly 14 months.
Rohit Sharma will lead the Men in Blue in the series against Afghanistan.
KL Rahul has been left out of the squad.
Hardik Pandya and Suryakumar Yadav will also not be participating in the T20I series against Afghanistan due to injuries.
Others: This will be India's last T20I series before the forthcoming T20 World Cup 2024.
The India vs Afghanistan T20I series will be live streamed on JioCinema app and website in India.
The India vs Afghanistan T20I series will be live telecasted on Sports 18 Network.
